comments.comment:
meyaa enna hadanne ratata aadareta newei kiyala onema kenek dannawa.r awurudu 20k tisse ratata aadare karapu heti  minissu dannawa.mulu parampatawama rata horas kaala kaala ,minii marala marala karanda thiyena kaalakanni weda serama karala ,rata loketa ukas karaddi minissu mekawa elewwa.eeth balla wage  piichan wewii hitiye aayeth kawadahariwath balayata enawa kiyana adahasin.
"puthaalata nadu,mallilata nadu,massinata nadu,mekage gaanita nadu.muuta nadu.mulu paramparawatama miniimarum saha horakam nadu.mewagen horu tika bera ganna thamayi try karanne.muu aayeth balayata awoth horu nidahas,minimaruwo nidahas, hiree inna kudu kaarayo nidahas, hithee hetiyata horaa kanda puluwan .mewwata misak ratata aadaretada üòï. 
mulu ratatama epa kiyala maithreeta rata baara dunne mey pal horu tika allala jampare andayi kiyala .eeth ekata maithreeta hayyak naha.eeka hinda minissu muuta chande dunna aayeth.ehema kalee muuta aadareta neweyi .maithree mun tika hiree nodapu hinda
